result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

defendant.name: Gregory, Lemont

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Lemont Gregory in court, in custody, with attorney Nicole M Masnica.   Shawn N Woller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State moves to have this case dismissed and read-in to 15CM1025, Court grants the State's motion.
From Milwaukee House of Correction for July 24, 2015  for Plea/Sentencing hearing on 07/27/2015 at 9:30 a.m.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 27, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Attorney Nicole M Masnica in court.   Defendant Lemont Gregory did not appear, appearance waived. Defendant was not present when contacted for his video appearance.   Lesli S Boese appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense states her client is at Milwaukee House of Correction. Defense requests a date in 30 days for a Plea/Sentencing. Court grants request. Court orders an OTP be prepared for the Defendant.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 27, 2015 at 09:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Lemont Gregory
Current: 8885 S 68th Street, c/o Milwaukee House of Corrections, Franklin, WI 53132 United States  (Effective: 06-09-2015)
Prior: 3242 N 44th St, Milwaukee, WI 53216

Attorney Nicole M Masnica in court.   Defendant Lemont Gregory did not appear.  Defendant was scheduled to appear by video but  video would not connect. Kevin M. Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is currently on a hold in MIlwaukee.  Hearing scheduled for June 22, 2015 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Lemont Gregory in court with attorney Sam Benedict for attorney Nicole M Masnica.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense requests another date in the summer. Defendant is in a counseling program. Court will give a review date in early June.  Hearing scheduled for June 8, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness/business listed in the Criminal Complaint.   Defendant to have no contact with any Pick N Save store.  Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.

Defendant Lemont Gregory in court with attorney Nicole Masnica.  Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Complaint given to defense. Reading waived.   NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED. Court sets bail at $200.00 signature bond with conditions. Court orders warrant quashed. Court will give another date for hearing.  Hearing scheduled for April 17, 2015 at 10:00 am.
